data.title: SporTV
data.text:
SporTV is a Brazilian cable television network that has its programming based on all sports, launched in 1991 by Globosat (currently Canais Globo, the Globo linear television division). It's the most watched sports channel in Brazil. High-definition simulcasts of SporTV and SporTV 2 were launched on January 18, 2013. Before that, select events were broadcast in HD on sister channel Globosat HD (now Mais).

This article is about the Brazilian sports network. For the similarly named and themed network in Portugal, see Sport TV.
